name: Precision Surgical Corporation
description: Precision Surgical Corporation is a leading innovator in the medical device industry, specializing in advanced surgical instruments and technologies. Founded in 2010, the company is dedicated to enhancing surgical outcomes through precision engineering and cutting-edge design. PSC offers a wide range of products including minimally invasive surgical tools, robotic-assisted surgical systems, and diagnostic imaging devices. The company's flagship products are designed to improve accuracy and reduce recovery times for patients, making surgeries safer and more efficient. Precision Surgical Corporation is committed to research and development, continuously striving to introduce groundbreaking solutions that address the needs of healthcare professionals and patients alike. With a strong focus on quality and compliance, PSC adheres to stringent regulatory standards, ensuring that all products meet the highest levels of safety and effectiveness. The company collaborates with leading hospitals and surgical centers around the globe to provide training and support, ensuring that healthcare providers are equipped with the knowledge and tools necessary to utilize their products effectively. As the demand for advanced surgical technologies grows, Precision Surgical Corporation aims to expand its product offerings and reach, solidifying its position as a trusted partner in the healthcare industry.

seo.meta_title: Precision Surgical Corporation | Innovating Surgical Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Precision Surgical Corporation, a leader in advanced surgical instruments and technologies dedicated to improving surgical outcomes.

faq.question: What products does Precision Surgical Corporation offer?
faq.answer: PSC offers minimally invasive surgical tools, robotic-assisted surgical systems, and diagnostic imaging devices.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Precision Surgical Corporation?
faq.answer: Dr. Sarah Thompson is the CEO of Precision Surgical Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Precision Surgical headquartered?
faq.answer: Precision Surgical is headquartered in San Diego, California, USA.

faq.question: When was Precision Surgical Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Precision Surgical Corporation was founded in 2010.
